snippet: Exercise lovers, your worries are over. Or some of them are, because Jawbone and Nike are introducing new wearable, accelerometer-based fitness-tracking bands.
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column discusses new wearable, accelerometer-based fitness-tracking wristbands by Jawbone and Nike; says Nike's Fuelband is polished and professional, while Jawbone's Up band has a few design flaws but is more likely to help user become healthier.
lead_paragraph: Exercise lovers, your worries are over. Or some of them are, because Jawbone and Nike are introducing new wearable, accelerometer-based fitness-tracking bands.

headline.seo: A Review of New Activity-Tracking Bands From Nike and Jawbone
